Tests that the entire viewport is painted with a floated html element.

(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 0.00 0.00 800.00 600.00)
        (rect 0.00 0.00 800.00 50.00)
        (rect 0.00 0.00 800.00 50.00)
        (rect 0.00 0.00 800.00 50.00)
        (rect 100.00 100.00 441.00 50.00)
        (rect 8.00 16.00 784.00 18.00)
        (rect 108.00 116.00 425.00 18.00)
        (rect 8.00 16.00 784.00 18.00)
        (rect 108.00 116.00 425.00 18.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
